::SPears::

She smiled confidantly. "I will do anything to make him happy. 
Anything. What ever he asks of me, I shall fufill. And do it gladly."
She was saying this and meaning it now.  Without question, she felt 
compelled to do what ever Prebon asked her to do.

"HOw much longer till we get there.  I'll do my best to make it look 
good.  But don't worry, I'll not get away." she said with a smile.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, minime_316@h... wrote:
> OOC: BIG NEWS! Remember awhile back I wanted to host a chat with 
> everyone to celebrate the anniversary? Well, I was thinking we 
could 
> use the chat here at egroups cause the one at the sigh isn't very 
> good. But the thing is, and don't get your hopes up because it 
isn't 
> official, that II could get Bob Skir, one of the writers and 
> Producers of Beast Wars, to join us at the chat! What do you all 
> think?
> 
> Ignatius
> 
> "No, nothing. You aren't doing anything wrong. It't just 
> that...sometimes Prebon might be hard to please. He could ask a lot 
> of you. Are you prepared for that?"
